titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 4909) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2017 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 4909) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2017 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-571, by Mr. Byrne.
The resolution provides for further consideration of H.R. 4909.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 115.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 735.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 175 (Roll no. 200).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4909 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2017) in the House of Representatives.
